snippet: Chris Stringer answers questions about the evidence of interbreeding between Neanderthals and Homo sapiens and the extinct species of little people nicknamed the hobbits.
abstract: Interview with British paleoanthropologist Chris Stringer, a leading authority on modern human evolution; Stringer discusses recent developments and archaeological discoveries, including evidence of interbreeding between Neanderthals and Homo sapiens.
lead_paragraph: Chris Stringer answers questions about the evidence of interbreeding between Neanderthals and Homo sapiens and the extinct species of little people nicknamed the hobbits.

headline.print_headline: A Bone Here, a Bead There: On the Trail of Human Origins
headline.seo: Chris Stringer on the Origins and Rise of Modern Humans
headline.main: A Bone Here, a Bead There: On the Trail of Human Origins
